name: Army Attack Mission: FPS Shoot
description:
Army Attack Mission: FPS Shooter!!!
You are a super army frontline commando warrior of the world war, as an elite killer needs to defend his country and armed forces against SWAT Terrorist Strike, show your sharp shooter and heavy artillery skills in the battle zone.
FEATURES

Exquisite FPS weapon controls
Weapon Swapping Action of Soldiers
Amazing, dangerous and difficult secret agent elite mission first person shooting game
7 Objective based levels
Intense smash and shooting action
